decks.name: Arasaka Portable Prototype Deck
decks.description: Double redundancy circuitry and SP20. Immune to Hellburner and Hellbots. 50% avoid Krash, DeckKRASH, and similiar programs. 30% immune to Flatline or Poison Flatline. Deck isn't sold openly. Bartmoss Brainware Blowout pg. 94

decks.name: Shadowdeck
decks.description: Used as a relay between a cell deck and the NET. Runner is at a -2 Speed while using this deck. Comes with a builtin Watchdog program. Has a cellular receiver for a cellular deck to connect to. Not available on the open market. Cannot be connect to directly. Netrunner can't change nor use any functions of the deck. When trace is done on runner, roll 1D10 vs 10 - Netrunner's INT. If equal or below the trace stops at the deck. Else the runner's is alerted by the watchdog. Bartmoss Brainware Blowout pg. 16

decks.name: Techtronlca Net-Runner Cybermodem Utility Suit
decks.description:
Cyber suit with keyboard on arm. SP12 all locations. Bio-monitor and wide-band radio commlink included. Adding cellular and IR Sneaksuit option +1500eb.
Bartmoss Brainware Blowout pg. 16
